layout.name: projectile
layout.title: Projectile
layout.tooltip: Which NPC to fire from the blaster (use none to fire regular Bullet Bills).

layout.name: beforetimer
layout.title: Pre-Firing Timer
layout.tooltip: Number of frames the bill blaster waits before firing. Set to 0 to use the default (96).

layout.name: aftertimer
layout.title: Post-Firing Timer
layout.tooltip: Number of frames the bill blaster waits before turning. Still used when not rotating. Set to 0 to use the default (64).

layout.name: rotates
layout.title: Rotate
layout.tooltip: If not checked, the blaster will only ever face its original direction.
